name: Hell Dragon
description: A fiery and fierce guardian of the underworld, embodying relentless power and destruction.

name: Wind Dragon
description: A swift and graceful creature, soaring through the skies with unparalleled agility and freedom.

name: Illusion Dragon
description: A master of deception, weaving illusions that captivate and confuse its enemies.

name: Earth Dragon
description: A steadfast guardian of the land, drawing strength from the rocks and soil to protect its domain.

name: Water Dragon
description: A majestic being from the deep, flowing gracefully through oceans and commanding the tides.

name: Spring Dragon
description: A symbol of renewal and vitality, bringing life and energy to the lands it graces.

name: Undead Dragon
description: A haunting specter, bound by dark magic and forever roaming the shadowy realms.

name: Lazy Dragon
description: The ancient creator of dragons, known for its leisurely demeanor and untold wisdom.

name: Charming Dragon
description: A mesmerizing creature, enchanting all who encounter its graceful and alluring presence.

name: Ice Dragon
description: An awe-inspiring beast from the frozen tundras, capable of summoning blizzards at will.
